review: Chromecast is a fun device to have. It's not a necessity, but it's at $35, it's worth buying to be able to watch YouTube videos and see webpages on your television.

review: Excellent product, it is useful and easy to connect, just need more apps to use at home, but i really like it.

review: Chromecast works awesome! Perfect solution for the 'non tech savy' end user.  I use two of these in the house (one in living room and one in bedroom) and it works great for everything from youtube videos/music, to google play apps, to pandora. Love it!
